string.original: Addon is related to/comes with another Addon
string.translation: Addon is related to/comes with another Addon

string.original: Site ID is Addon this one comes with
string.translation: Site ID is Addon this one comes with

string.original: Site ID is numeric + Addon name from site. e.g.: "5001-Minimalist"
string.translation: Site ID is numeric + Addon name from site. e.g.: "5001-Minimalist"

string.original: Site ID is the part of the Addon URL after /details/, e.g.: "2003" or "sw-stats"
string.translation: Site ID is the part of the Addon URL after /details/, e.g.: "2003" or "sw-stats"

string.original: Site ID is the part after f= in the download URL
string.translation: Site ID is the part after f= in the download URL

string.original: Site ID is developer name. e.g.:"tekkub-wow"
string.translation: Site ID is developer name. e.g.:"tekkub-wow"

string.original:
Site ID is [branches|tags|trunk] followed by Addonname optionally followed by developer/version etc,
 e.g.: --> branches/!!Warmup/ckknight
 --> tags/lern2count/1.12/lern2count_plugins/lern2count_bongos
 --> trunk/Zookeeper
string.translation:
Site ID is [branches|tags|trunk] followed by Addonname optionally followed by developer/version etc,
 e.g.: --> branches/!!Warmup/ckknight
 --> tags/lern2count/1.12/lern2count_plugins/lern2count_bongos
 --> trunk/Zookeeper

string.original: WUU cannot access this site anymore
string.translation: WUU cannot access this site anymore

string.original: Imports Addon site settings from file, only for addons already on your list
string.translation: Imports Addon site settings from file, only for addons already on your list

string.original: Imports Addons from an addon pack ID
string.translation: Imports Addons from an addon pack ID

string.original: Exports all currently selected Addons to file
string.translation: Exports all currently selected Addons to file

string.original: Version check and, if needed, update all Addons
string.translation: Version check and, if needed, update all Addons

string.translation: Insert a New entry into the Addon List

string.original: Delete the selected Addons and all related
string.translation: Delete the selected Addons and all related

string.translation: Restore the selected Addons from Backup

string.original: Checks all the Addon sites for new versions
string.translation: Checks all the Addon sites for new versions

string.original: Updates all older Addons - online version must be known for this to work!
string.translation: Updates all older Addons - online version must be known for this to work!

string.original: Gets Addon site settings from the online database (user-submitted, only affects [Unknown] Addons)
string.translation: Gets Addon site settings from the online database (user-submitted, only affects [Unknown] Addons)

string.original: Copy a list of the selected Addons to BBCode for forums
string.translation: Copy a list of the selected Addons to BBCode for forums

string.original: Lets you install Addons directly from WoWAce
string.translation: Lets you install Addons directly from WoWAce

string.original: Lets you install Addons directly from CosmosUI
string.translation: Lets you install Addons directly from CosmosUI

string.original: Installs a single Addon, given the URL to its web page (Experimental, might not work, doesn\'t support all sites yet)
string.translation: Installs a single Addon, given the URL to its web page (Experimental, might not work, doesn\'t support all sites yet)

string.original: Cleans out the temp dir WUU uses to store downloaded addon archives
string.translation: Cleans out the temp dir WUU uses to store downloaded addon archives

string.original: Checks WUU site for updated regular expressions
string.translation: Checks WUU site for updated regular expressions

string.original: Scans for missing dependencies, and tries to install them from the master list
string.translation: Scans for missing dependencies, and tries to install them from the master list

string.translation: BETA FEATURE: Uploads your addon list to the WUU web page, for future inclusion in the master list

string.original: Removes all addons that are deleted outside WUU from the internal addon list
string.translation: Removes all addons that are deleted outside WUU from the internal addon list

string.translation: Generates a report on the last update

string.translation: Enable this to turn off WUUs handling of newlines when unpacking archives

string.translation: If this is enabled, WUU will open a report of all the changes in your web browser after updating (WoWAce only, for now)

string.translation: Uses the Coral Content Distribution Network to save on the sites' bandwidth
